creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: seated Buddha; PL hand in lap with open palm, index and thumb loosely touching; PR hand up, with index finger and thumb touching; two-tiered knobby hair, long earlobes; traces of red pigment on robes; seated on wide, stylized lotus on round base
medium: Polychromed Japanese cypress (hinoki) with traces of gilding
title: Seated Amida Buddha
